about_the_game:
DLC "Her Vanishing Silhouette" is a deeply integrated expansion to the story of Hero's Adventure.
●New Female Companion: Dive into the elaborate story of a new female companion characterized by depth and complexity. With over 30 unique events, explore the mysteries and determinations hidden behind her enigmatic presence.

●Join the Nine Factions Sect: Navigate the ebbs and flows of the martial world through the lens of a new faction. Your choices will shape the development and destiny of this realm. The expansion includes more than 100 new faction-related events, 4 distinct endings, and corresponding achievements.

●Innovative Custom Martial Arts Gameplay: Elevate your mastery without forsaking your past learnings. By synthesizing two well-practiced martial arts, you can create and master a unique high-level martial art that is uniquely yours.

— "Master and name your bespoke martial art, meet the unconcerned woman in white, align with a new faction, and sway the course of the martial world."
